Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.exist

Interface Summary
IAeExistConnection Connection to the eXist database, similar to a JDBC or TConnection.
IAeExistDataSource An interface that defines the set of methods needed to give access to the Exist database.
 

Class Summary
AeDelegatingExistConnection Delegating implementation of an exist connection - delegates all calls to the delegate connection.
AeExistConfig This class encapsulates the Exist XQuery statements used by the Active BPEL Exist based persistence layer.
AeExistConnection An Exist database connection.
AeExistConnectionPool Implements a connection pool for the test in-memory database.
AeExistDatabaseQueryRunner Queries a previously created eXist database.
AeExistDataSource The Exist data source.
AeExistStorageConnection A Exist version of the DB Connection wrapper interface.
AeExistStorageImpl An eXist version of the storage impl interface.
AeExistStorageProviderFactory A storage factory that creates Exist versions of the store objects.
AeExistXQueryResponse An eXist response from an XQuery.
